subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements: Statement-I: The orbitals having same energy are called as degenerate orbitals. Statement-II: In hydrogen atom, orbitals are not degenerate orbitals.

options.text: (1) Statement-I is true but Statement-II is false
(2) Both Statement-I and Statement-II are true.
(3) Both Statement-I and Statement-II are false
(4) Statement-I is false but Statement-II is true
